about_the_game:
Kinese is an experience I primarily wanted to share with the world, hence it being free. The best support you can give is to simply share it with others and recommend it to people you know. However for those that really enjoy it and would like to contribute something back, I decided to make that possible though a 'Tip Jar' DLC. All that this DLC does in-game is add a thank you message, but out-of-game it is hugely appreciated.

I would love to continue experimenting in VR and making experiences to share, so anything you can offer really does help make that possible. Thank you.

name: Kinese - Tip Jar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • Additional Notes: If you can run VR, you can run this.

short_description: The purpose of this DLC is simply to give a way for those that enjoyed the experience a way to offer their support. All that it changes in-game is to add a thank you message, but out of game it is hugely appreciated.
